price: 你说：“难道你们以你们的宗教通知安拉吗？安拉是知道天地间的一切的，安拉是全知万物的。”
arabic: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul atuʿallimūna al-laha bidīnikum wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
